About the Company: Arc Finance is a global non-profit that brings together practitioners, funders, pro-poor enterprises, and end-users to develop solutions for access to finance for clean energy and water. Our expertise is in providing the tools, technical services, catalytic investment, and linkages that allow these diverse groups to find common opportunity and achieve mutual benefits. The mission of Arc Finance is to promote and expand access to financing for energy, water and other basic needs to build the income and assets of poor people around the world. It was established in 2008.
